specialDays.title: Your Birthday
specialDays.quote:
It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.
— Seneca

specialDays.title: Friend's Birthday
specialDays.quote:
Never say about anything, 'I have lost it,' but only, 'I have returned it.'
— Epictetus

specialDays.title: January 16
specialDays.quote:
You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.
— Marcus Aurelius

specialDays.title: October 16
specialDays.quote:
He who fears death will never do anything worthy of a living man.
— Seneca
